Class DefaultContext

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.util.mathex.DefaultContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
Context
public class DefaultContext extends Object implements Context
Default Context implementation that can be configured.

    • DefaultContext

      public DefaultContext()
      Creates a new instance.

    • DefaultContext

      public DefaultContext(Context parentContext)
      Creates a new instance with a parent. If the new instance cannot serve a contextual information, it will ask the parent.
      Parameters:
      parentContext - the parent instance
